dmca.title: Notice of Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Raven [mailto:raven@ravensrants.com] 
Sent: Friday, July 01, 2005 10:23 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Notice of Infringement

Date: 07.01.2005

The Planet
1333 Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207

To Whom It May Concern,

I am writing to you to avail myself of my rights under the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA). This letter is a Notice of Infringement as
authorized in
